name: Royal Roomble
description:
A small multiplayer prototype done for school.

Get the highest score by popping the balloons on other roombas and picking up dirt. place dirt with your cursor and if you run low, select the dirt bucket to fill up again.

Requires controllers and 2 players minimum.

I may expand on this, but it was a good learning experience.

Left Stick - Move

Fire 1 - Place Dirt/ Select

Fire 2 - Slow Cursor Movement
